parts.text: {"word":"commemorate","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(人、事柄、出来事)を記念する、追悼する","english_definition":"to recall and show respect for (someone or something).","examples":[{"sentence":"We commemorate those who died in the war.","translation":"私たちは戦争で亡くなった人々を追悼します。"},{"sentence":"A statue was built to commemorate the poet.","translation":"その詩人を記念して像が建てられました。"},{"sentence":"The festival commemorates the town's founding.","translation":"その祭りは町の創立を記念するものです。"}],"collocations":["commemorate an anniversary (記念日を記念する)","commemorate a historical event (歴史的出来事を記念する)","commemorate a person's life (人の生涯を記念する)","commemorate with a ceremony (式典で記念する)","commemorate by building a monument (記念碑を建てて記念する)"],"synonyms":["memorialize","remember","honor","celebrate","pay tribute to","immortalize"],"antonyms":["forget","ignore","disregard","overlook"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の 'commemorare' (記憶にとどめる、思い出させる) に由来。 'com-' (共に) + 'memorare' (思い出させる) + 'memor' (記憶している) から構成されている。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/kəˈmeməreɪt/","syllables":"co-mem-o-rate"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["commemorate","commemorates"],"past_simple":"commemorated","past_participle":"commemorated","present_participle":"commemorating"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**commemorate**」は、過去の重要な出来事や人物を敬意をもって思い起こし、記憶にとどめることを意味します。単に思い出すだけでなく、式典や記念碑の建立など、何らかの行動を伴うことが多いです。追悼、顕彰、祝賀など、文脈によってニュアンスが異なります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ We celebrated to the victims.","correct":"✓ We commemorated the victims.","note":"「celebrate」は祝う意味合いが強く、追悼の意味合いがある「commemorate」とは使い分けが必要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I'm commemorating of my grandfather's death.","correct":"✓ I'm commemorating my grandfather's death.","note":"「commemorate」は他動詞であり、前置詞「of」は不要です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["commemoration (名詞: 記念、追悼)","commemorative (形容詞: 記念の、追悼の)"],"idioms_phrases":[],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「**commemorate**」は、過去の重要な出来事や人物を敬意をもって思い起こし、記憶にとどめることを意味する動詞です。単に思い出すだけでなく、式典や記念碑の建立など、何らかの行動を伴うことが多いです。追悼、顕彰、祝賀など、文脈によってニュアンスが異なります。フォーマルな場面や歴史的な文脈でよく用いられます。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The nation will **commemorate** the 100th anniversary of the armistice.","translation":"国は休戦協定100周年を記念する予定です。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"記念する"},{"sentence":"A memorial service was held to **commemorate** the victims of the disaster.","translation":"災害の犠牲者を追悼するために追悼式が行われました。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"追悼する"},{"sentence":"The city **commemorates** its founders with a parade every year.","translation":"その都市は毎年パレードで創設者たちを記念します。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"記念する"}]}
